name: GameAssist
description:
GameAssist is a modular Roll20 API automation suite for D&D 5E (2014 Character Sheet).

	FEATURES
	- Crit fumble handling (with confirm tables)
	- NPC death auto-marking
	- Concentration tracking (normal/adv/dis), player+GM whispers, marker toggle
	- Automatic HP rolling from `npc_hpformula`
	- Enable/disable modules in-game
	- Stable serialized event queue + watchdog
	- In-chat configuration via `!ga-config` or the Config UI (`!ga-config ui`)
	- Optional debug sandbox via `!ga-debug` (enable DebugTools)
	- Compatibility scoring hints when `GameAssist.flags.DEBUG_COMPAT` is true

	INCLUDED MODULES
	- ConfigUI
	- CritFumble
	- ConcentrationTracker
	- NPCManager
	- NPCHPRoller
	- DebugTools

	API COMMANDS
	- !ga-enable, !ga-disable, !ga-config, !ga-config-ui, !ga-config ui, !ga-status, !ga-metrics, !ga-conc-status
	- !npc-hp-all, !npc-hp-selected, !npc-death-report
	- !concentration, !cc
	- !ga-debug, !critfail, !critfumble, !critfumble-<melee|ranged|thrown|spell|natural>, !confirm-crit-martial, !confirm-crit-magic

	REQUIREMENTS
	- TokenMod API (strongly recommended)
	- Rollable tables for CritFumble: CF-Melee, CF-Ranged, CF-Thrown, CF-Spell, CF-Natural, Confirm-Crit-Martial, Confirm-Crit-Magic

	SETUP & DOCUMENTATION
	- github.com/Mord-Eagle/GameAssist
	- README: https://github.com/Mord-Eagle/GameAssist#readme

	COMPATIBILITY
	- Compatible with the D&D 5E (2014) sheet. For setup, troubleshooting, and latest updates, see the README.
conflicts: Other scripts that modify NPC HP or use bar1_value
